#summary Upload use case.

= Details =

Actor: Centralized Content Server, Basic User/Content Distributor

Pre-condition: user has upload privileges.
 
  # User selects a file to upload.
  # Client opens connection (if necessary) with the content server.
  # Client transfers file to content server over HTTP.
  # Server dynamically updates appropriate pages to reflect new content.
